name: Tic Tac Toe 3-in-a-row
description:
The classic tic tac toe game with a fresh new look that goes beyond X's and O's. Select from a variety of alternate playing icons. Game play is simple and easy first player to get 3 in a row wins. Apple watch interface for playing on the go.

Features:
* Two player gameplay
* Change which player gets the first move
* Selectable player icons
* Wins tracker
* Easy to play
* Quick loading
* Apple Watch compatible
* Game play in notifications panel

Download today and play on any device.
